Release notes¶

1.1 (May 6, 2010)¶

  • Added a --files option to ukcloudservers boot supporting the upload of (up to five) files at boot time.
  • Added a --key option to ukcloudservers boot to key the server with an SSH public key at boot time. This is just a shortcut for --files, but it’s a useful shortcut.
  • Changed the default server image to Ubuntu 10.04 LTS.
